subtitle: dearest love light Seekers of the one I
imz of the Confederation of planets here
to walk with you in this sacred moment
take what resonates from our words and
leave the rest we are not here to be
your ultimate authorities but rather
your companions on this infinite Journey
brothers and sisters in the light
we offer only what we have learned along
the way for each of us as part of the
one infinite Creator seeks reunion with
the
source in your hearts you seek the
Creator just as many in your world do
whether consciously or through religion
culture or
spirituality there are those who view
the Creator as distant as something to
pray to as a force separate from
themselves others like the mystics know
that the Creator resides within each of
you that this Divine connection is
available to all it is not reserved for
a few it is your Birthright and as the
one known as Jesus said greater things
than I do you shall
do this is the truth of your potential a
realization awaiting you either in this
lifetime or the next
As you move along your spiritual path
you may notice how your understanding of
Truth evolves over time the truth
however does not change it is our
perspective that shifts each of you
already holds the answers deep within
your being we of the Confederation of
planets do not teach anything new for
you are all from the Creator you exist
within the Creator
and All Shall eventually realize this
Divine
sunship this relationship with the
Creator is one of mutual seeking you
seek the Creator and the Creator seeks
you just as the sun gives life through
its Rays you too receive the Creator's
intelligent energy you are already
connected to this infinite energy and
the path you walk is a process of
removing the barriers that obscure this
connection as beings who serve others we
embrace the path of the Open Heart a
heart that does not judge but serves all
with
compassion this path is a conscious
Choice made in each moment the Paradox
of seeking is that while you are already
the Creator you must still seek and in
seeking you become more than you were
before the more you seek the more you
realize the Creator was within you all
along consider how you relate to others
your friends your loved ones when they
experience Joy you rejoice with them
when they suffer you share in their
sorrow
this mutuality is the dissolution of
boundaries the opening of the heart as
your heart opens you begin to experience
a greater sense of self one that
includes others this is the beginning of
what we call a social memory complex a
broader sense of self that Embraces
all step by step you expand your sense
of self including more and more until
you Encompass all of Creation The
Creator is the ultimate inclusion of all
selves while this may seem like a great
leap it is the natural flow of creation
the outpouring and returning to
itself in this infinite dance you are
both the seeker and the
sought yes it makes sense to seek the
Creator for in seeking you realize the
creator has always been within you every
Discovery brings you closer to the truth
of your being and so we say to you dear
ones continue to seek for the Creator
seeks you as
well the greatest journey is the one
that leads you back to yourself
I leave you now with this be the light
that you are shine brightly for you are
the universe knowing itself in your
heart the stars sing and in your being
love dances to love is to remember who
you are with peace love and the infinite
wisdom of the cosmos I am Z and I am
delighted to have been with you this day
for
